title: 212.3 VOX Mini - Should I Stay at a Church That Teaches Reformed Theology?
description:
What are the roots of reformed theology? A listener writes in to discuss whether or not they should stay in a church that adheres to this thinking when they themselves do not.

Learn more about the VOX Podcast:
www.voxpodcast.com
